languages.text: "Каллигос Винтерскейл — длань Императора, заслоняющая Простор от врагов Человечества. Он уже осознал свою сущность и свои деяния. И пусть мне это не нравится, живым он послужит Империуму куда лучше, чем мертвый".

traits.locale_text: "Каллигос Винтерскейл — длань Императора, заслоняющая Простор от врагов Человечества. Он уже осознал свою сущность и свои деяния. И пусть мне это не нравится, живым он послужит Империуму куда лучше, чем мертвый".

languages.text: "Calligos Winterscale is the hand of the Emperor that shields the Expanse from Humanity's enemies. He has seen his true nature and that of his deeds. And while I would rather not admit it, he would serve the Imperium far better alive than dead."
languages.original_text: "Каллигос Винтерскейл — длань Императора, заслоняющая Простор от врагов Человечества. Он уже осознал свою сущность и свои деяния. И пусть мне это не нравится, живым он послужит Империуму куда лучше, чем мертвый".

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterscale — the hand of the Emperor, shielding the Expanse from the enemies of Mankind. He had already realized his nature and his deeds. However may I dislike it, alive he would serve the Imperium much better than dead.

"Calligos Winterscale — the hand of the Emperor, shielding the Expanse from the enemies of Mankind. He had already realized his nature and his deeds. However may I dislike it, alive he would serve the Imperium much better than dead.

"Calligos Winterscale — the hand of the Emperor, shielding the Expanse from the enemies of Mankind. He had already realised his nature and his deeds. And while I don't like it, alive he would serve the Imperium much better than dead.

"Calligos Winterscale — the hand of the Emperor, shielding the Expanse from the enemies of Mankind. He had already realised his nature and his deeds. And while I don't like it, alive he would serve the Imperium much better than dead.

"Calligos Winterscale is the hand of the Emperor that shields the Expanse from Humanity's enemies. He has seen his true nature and that of his deeds. And while I would rather not admit it, he would serve the Imperium far better alive than dead."

"Calligos Winterscale is the hand of the Emperor that shields the Expanse from Humanity's enemies. He has seen his true nature and that of his deeds. And while I would rather not admit it, he would serve the Imperium far better alive than dead."

languages.text: «Calligos Winterscale es la mano del Emperador, protector de la Extensión contra los enemigos de la Humanidad. Su naturaleza y sus logros ya son de sobras conocidos. Y aunque no me guste nada admitirlo, vivo servirá mucho mejor al Imperium que muerto».
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale is the hand of the Emperor that shields the Expanse from Humanity's enemies. He has seen his true nature and that of his deeds. And while I would rather not admit it, he would serve the Imperium far better alive than dead."

traits.locale_text: «Calligos Winterscale, la mano del Emperador, protector de la Extensión contra los enemigos de la Humanidad. Su naturaleza y sus logros ya son de sobras conocidos. Y aunque no me haga ninguna gracia, vivo servirá mucho mejor al Imperium que muerto».

languages.text: “卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔是帝皇之手，守护科罗努斯扩区，对抗人类之敌。他已经认识到了自己的本质与犯下的过错。虽然我很不愿意承认，但与其杀死他，不如让他活着继续侍奉帝国，这才是最好的结果。”
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale is the hand of the Emperor that shields the Expanse from Humanity's enemies. He has seen his true nature and that of his deeds. And while I would rather not admit it, he would serve the Imperium far better alive than dead."

traits.locale_text: “卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔是帝皇之手，一直以来保护科罗努斯扩区不受人类之敌的侵害，而他已经认识到了自己的本性和过错。虽然我不喜欢这么说，但与其杀死他，不如让他活着，这样他才能更好地为帝国服务。”

languages.text: « Calligos Winterscale, le bras de l'Empereur qui protège les Étendues contre les ennemis de l'humanité. Il a déjà pris conscience de sa nature et de ses actes. Même si ça ne me plaît guère, je reconnais qu'il serait bien plus utile à l'Imperium vivant que mort. »
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale is the hand of the Emperor that shields the Expanse from Humanity's enemies. He has seen his true nature and that of his deeds. And while I would rather not admit it, he would serve the Imperium far better alive than dead."

traits.locale_text: « Calligos Winterscale, le bras de l'Empereur qui protège les Étendues contre les ennemis de l'humanité. Il a déjà pris conscience de sa nature et de ses actes. Même si ça ne me plaît guère, je reconnais qu'il serait bien plus utile à l'Imperium vivant que mort. »

languages.text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケール…人類の敵からエクスパンスを守る皇帝の手。主はすでにその本性と行いを悟っていた。俺にとっては気に入らないが、ヤツは生きていたほうが、死んだときよりもずっと帝国に貢献できる」
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale is the hand of the Emperor that shields the Expanse from Humanity's enemies. He has seen his true nature and that of his deeds. And while I would rather not admit it, he would serve the Imperium far better alive than dead."

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケール…人類の敵からエクスパンスを守る皇帝の手。彼はすでにその本性と行いを悟っていた。俺にとっては気に入らないが、ヤツは生きていたほうが、死んだときよりもずっと帝国に貢献できる」

languages.text: "Calligos Winterzunder ist die Hand des Imperators, die die Ausdehnung vor den Feinden der Menschheit beschützt. Er hat seine wahre Natur und die seiner Taten gesehen. Und obwohl ich es nur ungern zugebe, würde er dem Imperium lebend weit mehr nützen als tot."
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale is the hand of the Emperor that shields the Expanse from Humanity's enemies. He has seen his true nature and that of his deeds. And while I would rather not admit it, he would serve the Imperium far better alive than dead."

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterzunder — die Hand des Imperators, die die Ausdehnung vor den Feinden der Menschheit beschützt. Er hatte sein Wesen und seine Taten bereits erkannt. Und auch, wenn es mir nicht gefällt, lebend würde er dem Imperium mehr nützen als tot.
